scripts.test: mkdir lib lib/spectre.css/ lib/spectre.css/dist/ lib/darkreader/ && cp node_modules/spectre.css/dist/spectre.min.css lib/spectre.css/dist/ && cp node_modules/spectre.css/LICENSE lib/spectre.css/ && cp node_modules/darkreader/* lib/darkreader/ && web-ext lint --ignore-files='package.json package-lock.json images README.md' && rm -r lib
scripts.build: mkdir lib lib/spectre.css/ lib/spectre.css/dist/ lib/darkreader/ && cp node_modules/spectre.css/dist/spectre.min.css lib/spectre.css/dist/ && cp node_modules/spectre.css/LICENSE lib/spectre.css/ && cp node_modules/darkreader/* lib/darkreader/ && web-ext build --ignore-files='package.json package-lock.json images README.md' --overwrite-dest && rm -r lib
